actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit Members of Congress from sending certain mail matters as franked mail during the 60-day period prior to certain elections.

summary.text: Prohibits Members of Congress from sending a general mass mailing as franked mail within 60 days of a primary, general, or special election, or of a nominating caucus or convention, for any Federal office which is held in the State, district, or territory from which such Members were elected.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39, United States Code, to prohibit Members of Congress from sending certain mail matters as franked mail during the 60-day period prior to certain elections.
